mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, tel_num, address FROM mst_customer WHERE customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{customerName} ,'%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mst_customer (customer_name, email, tel_num, address, is_active) VALUES (#{customerName}, #{email}, #{telNum}, #{address}, #{isActive});
mapper.update: UPDATE mst_customer SET customer_name = #{customerName}, email = #{email}, tel_num = #{telNum}, address = #{address}, WHERE customer_id = #{customerId};
